name: Shrodinger's Cat: Wanted Dead And Alive
name_original: Shrodinger's Cat: Wanted Dead And Alive
description:
Shrodinger's Cat: Wanted Dead And Alive is a platformer game developed by halfpawsoftware. It came out on 23-04-2018.
Shrodinger's Cat: Wanted Dead And Alive is available on Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
